alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Wind River Mountains West; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:39PM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park, Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains, Wind River Mountains West and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 8 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Teton, Togwotee, and Salt River Passes will be tricky to navigate with low visibility and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Wind River Mountains West; Yellowstone National Park
